BreadcrumbHomeNPDES Permits Around the NationVirginia NPDES PermitsIn Virginia, EPA has delegated authority to issue NPDES permits to the Virginia Dept. of Environmental Quality.For state-issued permits, visitVirginia Pollutant Discharge Elimination System Permit ProgramContact Us About NPDES Permits Around the Nationto ask a question, provide feedback, or report a problem.Last updated on August 4, 2025
